entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
